import MDM

cordlist = []
f = open("cordinates.txt", 'w')

def AcquiredPosition():
  res = MDM.send('AT$GPSACP\r', 0) 
  res = MDM.receive(30)
  if(res.find('OK') != -1):
    tmp = res.split("\r\n")
    res = tmp[1]
    tmp = res.split(" ")
    return tmp[1]
  else:
    return ""

while (1):
    res = MDM.receive(60)
    p = AcquiredPosition()
    cordlist.append(p)
    cordlist.append("\r\n")
    f.writelines(cordlist)
